tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE movement_history (
    player_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    x_position FLOAT,
    y_position FLOAT,
    movement_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE player_movement(
    movement_id UUID,
    player_id UUID,
    movement_type VARCHAR,
    movement_speed INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE gameplay_events(
    event_id UUID,
    player_id UUID,
    event_type VARCHAR,
    event_data JSON,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE gameplay_analysis(
    analysis_id UUID,
    player_id UUID,
    analysis_type VARCHAR,
    analysis_result JSON,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
